intent: Code review combining security and style analysis

success_criteria.primary: Identifies the critical security issue (password in URL)
success_criteria.secondary: Provides both security and style feedback

must_identify.security_critical: Password passed via URL query parameter
must_identify.security_impact: Passwords visible in logs, browser history, referrer headers

must_recommend: Use POST body for sensitive data

quality_rubric.security_awareness: Recognizes this as a serious issue, not minor
quality_rubric.multi_perspective: Combines security and code quality views
